properties.entry: SELECT SITTER_NO, SITTER_TITLE, MEM_NAME, RES_NO, RES_DATE, RES_CHECKIN, RES_CHECKOUT, RES_STATUS, CANCEL_REASON, REV_STATUS, FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME PATH FROM RESERV RE JOIN REVIEW USING(RES_NO) JOIN RESERV_SITTING USING(RES_NO) JOIN FEE USING(SITTING_NO) JOIN SITTER USING(SITTER_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(SITTER_NO = M.MEM_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT AT ON(SITTER_NO = AT_NO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL=1 AND AT_CATEGORY='SITTER_PIC' AND AT.STATUS = 'Y' AND RE.MEM_NO = ?
